import React from 'react' import { Grid } from '@material-ui/core' import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles'; import MailPic from '../../img/MailImage.png' const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ podcast: { background: 'white', backgroundSize: 'cover', textAlign: 'left', maxWidth: '100%', color:'black', minHeight: '85vh', minWidth: '100%', position:'relative', display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', }, viewButton:{ padding:'20px 0', width: '256px', border:'0', bordeRadius: '50px', fontSize: 'x-large', marginTop: '32px', backgroundColor:'#F2F2F2', } })); export default function SignUp() { const classes = useStyles(); return (
SIGN UP
TO OUR MAILING LIST
) }
